content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the home of my parents with my three children around 6:15 pm on december 30, 2008. it was a clear cold night in the low teens. the sky was clear because you could see the stars as well as the planes flying over head. there was no precipitation in the air. as we stepped outside my parent's home, the entire sky lit up for approximately 5 to 10 seconds, but it seemed much longer. the sky because a bright and brilliant blue. the shade was a very light powedery color blue much like the color of a robin's egg. i remember noticing a couple of vapor trails in the sky and thinking to myself...Where is the sound? part of me was thinking that something had quickly flown over head because of the trails that i noticed and i was also expecting an impact shock. but there was none of either. the experience was jarring enough to scare all of my children causing them to run back inside the home. 

around the same time, my wife was driving home from work and noriced a large bright white light on the horizon that seemed to hover. it was as large as the moon. the moon was just finishing the new phase so it could not have been that. the light appeared to originate from the same approximate direction as the source of the bright blue flash. she lost sight of the object as she turned around the corner.

a friend of mine noted a power flicker around the same time in the village of mt. morris approximately 10 miles away.

around 11:00 pm, the power failed at the home for approximately five minutes.
content.summary: Bright flash of light blue light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Fisrt night i saw around 6 am a red ball of light going east then turned a sharp north.. right after i saw like a shooting star but it was there then it was gone and where it was heading toward a star that was stationary got realy bright and huge shot up and dissapeard. 2 nights later i got home from work looked up and saw 2 balls of light coming from the norh chasing each other until i couldnt see them anymore... for both events only took about 30 seconds for each event
content.summary: 2 round flying ufos way up in the stars chasing each other until gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 8 at the time. i was brushing my teeth when out of the window, i saw a ufo. it was nothing like i had ever seen. it was like an oval with the ends coming into a point. i can't quite remeber the date, but the date above is my best guess. i saw a lare conical place like someone if they wantied to poke up the head, they would have enoght room. it had green lights, and it was making a chriiinnng noise softly. i ran aaqy from the window. i have not see the thing since.
content.summary: I cant remember the date. disc with large view port over the the top.

content.detailedDescription: These human shaped/appearing lifeforms have been on our property off and on over the course of the past two years. a friend of mine who used to work with the federal government now retired, told me that pine trees emit the same heat as the human body does therefore that would make them invisible to any aircraft flying overhead with infrared surveillance. these lifeforms have the ability to shrink and grow in a matter of only a few seconds from the size of a dime to the height of full size adult, their faces are always covered with a bluish/black motorcycle helmets and the body which also has a similar matching motorcycle suit and when in full adult height is sitting on a motorcycle similar to the common design of a motorcycle but their head lights are much brighter than those of jet aircraft landing light, they travel at lightning fast speeds, and hide amongst the pine trees in the daytime, but at night they travel through the countryside in the area for reasons undetermined by me, i do not have cameras or video equipment for capturing this type of still and video of any quality that would support the actual visual sightings i have witnessed in these trees, and there are millions of these creatures living in the pinetrees in our backyard, its almost like a city of aliens larger than chicago, il in our backyard.....I can only hope that you not take my word for it and send some of your best photographers and videographers here to witness this phenomena themselves, because you will be awestruck to say the least by the activity here....These aliens i had once believed to be an only one dimensional figure, i now believe to be a six dimensional figure because if you were in a cube you could see their figure on every wall face including overhead and below you but not see them standing in front of you, or if they would to be a ghostly entity as it past thru your body.
content.summary: Human shaped/appearance lifeforms +/-3' height living in pinetrees along the perimeter of our yard everyday 24/7.

content.detailedDescription:
It's been a few years since my sighting in southern california although i just recently heard about the mufon sight on tv and wanted to share my observation.

i was gardening in my back yard and something caught my eye very high in the sky (almost as if they were star like) facing south of my location. 

i saw 10 objects, 9 small and 1 larger, very reflective and bright, similar to stars (brightness) although in the clear, daytime sky. the 9 smaller objects moved around slowly in many different patterns and directions although the movement seemed well coordinated. once in a while they (the smaller objects) would have very quick bursts of speed and move around the larger object. the larger object seemed to move slowly, directly from west to east, stopping or at least slowing at times when the 9 smaller objects moved into the triangular shapes (see next paragraph). the overall group was progressivly moving from west to east.

as i was watching the objects, the 9 small objects moved into 3 perfect triangular shapes for a few minutes. they then moved out of the symetrical shapes and moved around as when i first sighted them. after a few minutes they then moved back into the 3 perfect triangular shapes. this went on, repeating for about 20 minutes.

all of the objects stayed relativly close to each other and the attachment hopefully will give you an idea of what i saw.

1.) my location. in my back yard. i was gardening at the time.
2.) the brightness as if stars in the daytime caught my attention.
3.) i could not tell what the objects were (they were too high in the sky) although the movements were well coordinated and controlled.
4.) description is in the text above.
5.) the feelings; amazement with almost a disbelief feeling / very happy feeling. my reaction; i tried to call some of my friends for them to go out and look (no luck getting in touch with anyone in the area). i also called my local police dept but they did not seem to be too interested. i walked to the front of my home to see if anyone was out in the neighborhood but could not locate anyone. during this time i did not want to lose sight of the objects and just kept observing. after sighting the objects i just felt a happy feeling, almost content that i witnessed something amazing.
6.) i lost sight of them after about 20 minutes. they seemed to just move very quckly to a point in which they were out of my vision. this was very quick and faster than you can blink your eye.

attached is a drawing of what i saw. thank you.
content.summary: 10 objects sighted, 9 small and 1 large.

content.detailedDescription:
It was new years eve. i was the designated driver and had nothing to drink. while at a party in a backyard pool area, i noticed a glowing red orange light. i pointed to the sky and asked loudly what the object was. others began to notice and chime in with the same question. i suggested a flare, because that seems to be the first explanation the news gives these days. at the point of the initial observation the object was approximately in between the size of a dime and the size of a quarter if held at arms length. one person then remarked that they thought it was a plane on fire. the color of the object was not consistent and varied from a red color to and orange color. it did not flicker like a fire would so i did not immediately think it was a fire. five to seven of the party goers left the  covering of the porch and moved out into the yard to get a better look. all the while people are commenting in disbelief. my friend, who is in school to be a pilot, remarked that he had never seen anything like this before. who ever initially made the comment about the plane made a comment later about how it could not be a plane on fire because it would have gone down by this point in time. 
the object appeared to be on a curved trajectory as it was larger and brighter at the beginning and then appeared to turn slightly and and head away from us. the light changed shape and size as the object turned. eventually the light became the size of a set of lights on an airplane, yet had a distinctively red color and did not blink like an airplane. the object became so distant at the end of the sighting that only 2 or 3 of us could see it tracking through the sky, then it was gone from view. the entire duration of the sighting was approximately 5 min. approximately 10-20 people witnessed the event. 
unfortunately no one at the party was able to video or take photos.
content.summary: A red orange non symmetrical, non flickering light moving in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
About 8 p.M. on december 25, 2008 i was looking out my 2nd story bedroom window, facing south. the sky was clear and the temperature was around 10 degrees. at approximately 45 degrees over the horizon towards the southwest i saw a very bright object -- brighter than any object in the sky.  it appeared as a flickering stationary object with colour changes. i observed this object with the naked eye for a minute. i then got out a pair of standard bell and howell 1944 wwii naval binoculars i have. through these i saw that it had blue, red, green and yellow blinking lights.  this went on for about 30 minutes and then disappeared. it appeared to move backwards and forwards. this was an object that was clearly lower than the stars. there was no sound.

i have seen this object twice since -- on january 1 at around 9 p.M. and january 2 at around 7 a.M. in these instances i could see it better. it appears to be a ball shaped object with a large light in the midsection and two rows of lights that run 90 degree angles to the center light. the lights appear in all cases to cycle -- the center light gets bright, fades, the lights in on both axis get brighter from the center, fade, and the cycle repeats -- on about a 3 or 4 second cycle. the object exhibits retrograde motion, going up/down/east/west before fading from view.

i might add that we live on a flight path for an airport that services both commercial and military aircraft. in addition, my wife is familar with military aircraft. i also am an amateur "naked eye" astronomer so i basically know what to see from my house. this is not anything we have typically seen -- and we routinely see helicopters (military and civilian), light aircraft, commercial aircraft, and military fixed wing (c-130, f-14, f-18) at very low levels (under 100 feet) we have been to most major aircraft museums and airshows so we have seen in person most common aircraft for the last 70 years. this wasn't anything we had seen.
content.summary: Strange object with coloured lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, daughter and i went for a walk on christmas day, we walked to tithe road in plympton, plymouth and saw 1 x orangey light moving fairly fast through the sky below cloud level at about 17:05. the light was moving on a straight course from east(ish) to west(ish). thought it was odd, not a plane and assumed it must of been a helicopter, although i was not entirely convinced.
we carried on our walk and some time later (17:15) when we had reached the bottom of great woodford drive in plympton, plymouth, just before the unicorn public house, we then saw a total of 5 orange coloured lights moving across the sky from east(ish) to west(ish). the first one was some way ahead of the others and they seemed to be on the same course as each other. they seemed to be just below cloud level as at some point the first one disappeared behind the cloud. eventually all of the lights went behind the clouds and we carried on walking. they moved at a fair speed as if aircraft, but the light was like a round spotlight moving through the sky and unlike any aircraft lights that i have seen (too big). we could not hear any sound but the main road did have traffic.
content.summary: Witnessed a total of 6 x orange coloured lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were at our front door getting some air.  these bright stars are plain as day lined up to eachother and taking shape.  three are lined up horizontal, while right next to those are three in the shape of a triangle.  the triangle began to take a different shape right before our eyes, sort of a arrowhead shape...  we couldnt explain it at all.  very freaky.  i get scared of acknowledgeing stuff like this.  so i am not out there looking at it anymore.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 bright star-like.

content.detailedDescription:
I and my friend were in sutomore in a cafe.There were many people on the beach and i photographd that.I didn`t see the ufo.I saw it while i was watching photos on the computer.It`s the same situation as in my first case.I don`t know has anybody seen the ufo,becouse there were many people there.Maybe they are invisible for our eyes,how could i know..
if you have any qvestions write me an e-mail and i will answer as soon as i can.With greetings from montenegro.
content.summary: Disc, metal, many colours.

content.detailedDescription: San diego - on new years eve 2009 i was showing constellations to my girlfriends dad. suddenly i noticed a bright red led-looking pinlight straight up (se) about 30 degrees to the left of the constellation orion. it was between 11:45-12:15pm dec 31 2009 (new years eve), which i suppose could make it suspect. it appeared as a bright red star, not moving, not twinkling, just on. it wasn't a satellite because it didn't move, it wasn't a helicopter or plane because there wasn't any sounds and it was way too high. it wasn't a firework and i'm sure it wasn't mars, venus or any other planet because it was much too red. i watched it for about 10-15 minutes then it seemed to dim then just disappeared. i know i wasn't seeing things because it was very bright and very cool... and i pointed it out to a bunch of people who saw it as well. i'm an avid stargazer and this is definitely the most unusual thing i had ever seen. i felt lucky to have witnessed it.
content.summary: Bright red led light in the san diego new year sky?

content.detailedDescription:
This is an abduction account, not a ufo sighting.  i saw no flying object during the whole duration of the event, and i didnt feel like i was in the air while i had the experience.  i was advised to report my experience here after posting on a forum because all i received there were crackpot theories and magical thinking where i was looking for serious feedback and comraderie by people who may have had a similar experience.  all the dates and times i wrote are very approximate, i only know it was around 5 am when it ended because i remember the image of my digital clock.  for the duration i just put two hours but i have no idea how long it lasted as i dont remember anything but sleeping before.  one night in july of 2002 i woke up and my first realization was that there was no blanket on me and my back was cold, like it was on some sort of cold metal (im starting to shake as i write this remembering it). my next realization is that i was not in my bed altogether, or in my room, but a small dull colored room (grey or black, i cant remember) with a few, two or three, figures standing over me. at first i thought i was in a hospital because i had been brought to the hospital for an asthma attack and once for a car crash, but it was different. there were no bright lights (only a dim sort of light like a dentists lights positioned directly over my face about two feet away, obscuring my vision of the figures), no door, and it wasnt a "room" per se. i couldnt see its beginning or end, only the ceiling and the fact that it was grey or another dull color, and my back was so cold. at first i thought the figures were human, and being extremely scared and not knowing where i was, i tried to get up and run (this was my first instinct), but i couldnt move. one of the figures placed a hand in the center of my chest and it was also cold, cold as ice, and slippery in a way, and it was also the same dull grey color of hte room. i also remember that the hand had long, long fingers that reached from the center of my chest where the palm and stretched outwards almost to my back. i was terrified and shaking but i couldnt physically do anything so i tried to look away, i didnt want to see who/whatever was touching me, but i couldnt even turn my head. all i could do was move my eyes. the one with the hand on my chest, he moved forward closer to my face, his face was maybe a foot and a half away (a little closer than the light). i saw then that he was not human, he (i say he, im not sure if it was a male or even if it had a gender) told me not to be afraid (not with words, he somehow put the thought into my head) but i was terrified. i didnt know what these things were or what they wanted me. i thought i was going to die. just the way they looked terrified me. the one face i saw then, the one that leaned in close and was touching my chest (which was bare by the way, as far as i remember i was naked, when i had went to bed in pajamas) was more oblong than a human face, the same color as the hand, no discernable nose and only a small slit for a mouth which i never saw open (it could even have been fused together), but the eyes were the scariest part. they were like black reflectors, big and almond shaped, and the head was large and circular with no hair. i saw the light reflecting in the corners of both of its eyes, like they were empty, and all i could do was lay there terrified. another creature then held my right arm (i know it was my right because there is a scar there) and "told" me i would feel a slight numbing sensation, and i did. i could not see what was happening. the next thing i knew, i awoke in my bed, uncovered by blankets (which were neatly folded in a triangular shape over the bottom half of my bed) but with my pajamas back on. i told my mother and father and they told me i had had a nightmare and for a long time i beleived them. it never occured to me to examine myself or look at my arm or anything, i am only 22 now and was only 16 then. maybe six months after this incident i began to hear voices and my parents noticed a steady decline in my school performance (before this i usually got straight a's but they were slipping to b's and c's) so they brought me to a psychiatrist who after a year or so diagnosed me with schizophrenia. for a few years i didnt beleive anything was wrong with me and didnt accept my illness, but at age 20 or so i finally did and decided that my abduction experience was perhaps the first symptom of my illness. but when i decided this i began to mull over the specifics of the experience and remembered the part where they told me id experience a slight numbing in my arm (which id forgotten up until that point) and promptly examined both my arms, and in the exact spot (as near as i can remember where the spot was) where i felt the numbing there was an inch-long, horizontal scar with a horizontal hard lump underneath it. i have had many of my friends and even my family feel this lump under the scar and agree that there is something hard there. my family thinks its perhaps from some childhood injury where a rock or something got trapped under my arm. my friends dont know what to think since i havnt told any of them anything about my experiences for fear of being made fun of or stigmatized. i did, however, tell numerous doctors about my experience and offered up my scar and lump as proof. all of them said the same thing: all this was being caused by my schizophrenia, i was delusional, and they were not going to operate on an old scar to remove what was probably just a cyst (however one or two doctors remarked that it was too hard to be a cyst and agreed with my family about the childhood injury theory). so i grew afraid to tell anyone about my experiences, having learned that talking about them in the hospital would only result in me being kept there longer and i would never be taken seriously by probably anyone.  i confided in my best friend about my experience and he was shocked to see the scar and feel the hardness underneath.
anyway, i resume my normal life, and try to convince myself that it was my illness but it still haunted me and seemed different somehow. then one night i woke up with the same cold-back sensation, no clothes on, figures standing over me, and again i was terrified. the same hand on the chest, the same "dont be afraid", and the same information that i woud experience numbness on my arm. i screamed (or i tried to scream, i cant remember if a sound came out), and they "said" "relax. its being removed", and although i didnt neccesarily beleive this there was nothing i could do. after the arm thing i was allowed to get up, although i was told to stay where i was standing, and the first thing i did was feel my arm and the hardness was gone. i asked why they put it in me and why they were taking it out now, why couldnt they just have left me alone. i was told that i had to have been given a "history of mental illness". i beleive it is so nobody would beleive my claims if i ever came forward. (now, before i get into the details, i would like to say that i have no idea if this is the truth or an elaborate lie concocted by the creatures for some reason, perhaps to pacify me). i asked (in different words) if i could know what this was all about, and two of the figures turned towards each other for a minute or so and just seemed to be looking at each other. the first figure turned back towards me and told me "yes, you may, but before i tell you let me assure you that you can tell whomever youd like. nobody will beleive you" (now when i say they told me something i dont mean audibly, i mean telepathically somehow. i was the only one communicating audibly). the one figure began what turned into a speech of sorts, which i obviously cant remember word for word, but i will outline the details i remember. it started out with saying that human religion is deeply flawed and "god" is a normal but intelligent man who came from an advanced civilization, somehow escaped when they were in the process of destroying themselves, and that he did not create the universe or earth and nobody, including the figures, knows who did or even whether someone or something created it or it just came into being somehow. "god" merely created enough dna copies of man so there would be enough variety in the genetic pool so as not to create inbreeding problems, and planted the first "batch" of his creations on earth because it was a suitable planet, to perpetuate his species. it was explained to me that "god" became immortal through cloning and another method able to preserve the conciousness of one clone to the next, and that our existence on earth so far represents a very very small segment of time versus the estimated time the universe has been in existence (im pretty sure humans already know this). he is not omnipotent nor does he interfere in anything humans do, we have complete free will. however, there is some kind of war going on that i "wouldnt understand" and the life of this man is in jeopardy (i asked why it even matters if he dies or not since he doesnt interfere in our lives at all and i was told that he must continue to live until the universe contracts and time begins again as it expands and the exact same events that took place unfold once again, so that he can perpetuate our species after earth humans' eventual extinction.) and in anticipation of his possible death, many sets of humans were born with 1/3 of this man's dna code on the end of a dormant string which has no influence on how they would develop, and i was one of these sets of three, and copies had to be made for backup elsewhere at various times in my life. this time i remember being dropped on my bed from what felt like an inch or two above it, and this time the blankets were just on the bed and i was clothed, although my shirt was inside out. the important part is since that day all symptoms of "schizophrenia" have gone away and i have stopped taking the medications which i thought i would be bound to for life. this last experience was in approx. april 2007.
i am a rational man, and i am aware that this sounds beyond beleif.  personally i think the whole god/patriarch story was a lie designed to make me feel special or needed and to prime me for future abductions (although nothing has happened since april 2007) but i am still haunted by the memories of these creatures and have a deep gut feeling that they are deceitful and malevolent.  i do not know why you ask for my phone number but i put my real phone number, except my work phone because obviously i do not want my coworkers to think im some kind of nutcase.  please do not publish my name though.
i have also attached several photos: the scar on my arm is the first one.
the second one is a marking which has been on my hand ever since the first experience (i am sure it was not there before then, as you can imagine how many times in a day i see the top of my own hand).  the scar is where the lump was but the marking, i have no idea why or how it got there.  on the marking photo, the black on the right side of my hand is not part of the marking, it is the start of a tattoo.
content.summary: This is an abduction account not a ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I don't remember the exact date of the event, but i was about 7 or 8 years old. though i was young, this is not an imagined event. i remember it pretty well to this day. i was playing hide and seek with the neighborhood kids, including my brother. the base was my front porch, and being sneaky, decided to double back through my back yard, hop the privacy fence, and come down the rather long (50 yards or so) side yard that ran next to the street. this was ingenious as most of the kids hid around the cul-de-sac my house was on (my house was the corner house). after climbing over and dropping down from the 6-foot fence, i looked up for some reason. no sound or light caused me to look up, i just did, perhaps thanks to the sixth sense of being watched. what i saw was a circular object covered in multi-colored lights that were flashing in patterns. i don't mean a few lights, i mean this thing looked like a times square sign. the craft was motionless  other than the lights and made no sound that i recall. the object was directly above me at an altitude of maybe 100 yards. from my perspective it was about 12 inches across if it was 2 feet above my head. i looked up at the craft for a short time, maybe 5-10 seconds. i then sprinted as fast as i could the 50 or so yards to the front of my house without looking back. i don't recall being fearful of the craft, i just ran out of instinct i suppose. i went inside to my room and turned my stereo on. it was a dual cassette and am/fm stereo that also had an auxiliary input, which was unused. i don't recall why, but i pushed the aux button. what i heard astonished me. before and since nothing but silence came from the auxiliarly source because there was nothing hooked up to it. that night there was a signal however. what i heard sounded like a foreign auctioneer. at least that's the best way i can describe it. i believe there were two other kids with me who also heard it, and i recall us commenting that it was alien tow truck drivers chatting on the radio. like i said only that night did sound come from that stereo when put on the aux mode. no one else saw the craft, but i remember others heard the radio chatter. i haven't seen any other ufo in my life nor have i heard the "alien chatter" again. i will never forget that night.
content.summary: Round craft covered in flashing multi-colored lights w/ radio interference.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen these balls of light off and on for a couple of years now near the house. i've attempted to get photos/video before but this is the first time anything decent came out of it.

the objects appear to flash colors. i can't make out any definite shape, they just look like round blinking balls of light. i've considered iridium flares or space debris but given the movement, or lack thereof, and  duration i am uncertain. sometimes there will be only one in the sky, sometimes there will be 3 or 4 with distance between them but perfectly aligned. sometimes they will flash for an hour or more and then just disappear, sometimes it's less. usually there isn't much movement at all.

i had a hard time finding it through my video camera, as the viewing screen does not work, therefore it produced some sudden up and down movements caused by my adjusting it and attempt at zooming. i did leave the recorder set up on a tripod for a bit checking it every once in a while and readjusting. it was readjusted at 1:46 and left alone. the object appears to be moving slowly behind the branches, to the right and then it goes off screen. the quick appearance of some of the light in the corner at 2:04 leaves me a bit skeptical of the sturdiness of the tripod though. as i went back to see if i needed to readjust, i noticed that the battery had died on the recorder. so i went back inside to view the pictures and the video that had been captured. the object was still in the sky when i went in. 

as mentioned earlier, the lights have been popping up from time to time for a while. i figured i'd submit what i have and see what they could possibly be.
content.summary: Ball of light not moving appearing to flash blue,red,green,white/yellow.

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 and i am now 29.  i came home from a friends house in the summer of 1995.  it was like any other night.  i went into my room and turned on the television and started to watch tv.  it was 10:30 pm est because my digital clock was right beside my tv.  i was not sleeping, was not laying down just sitting on my waterbed and the brightest light i have ever seen appeared outside my bedroom window.  it was so bright my room was totally whited out from it.  all i could hear was this pulsing sound vmm...Vmm...Vmm...Vmm, over and over.  the next thing i know i can't move.  i was't sleeping or tired or on any medicine.  i was fully awake!  i was then levitated out of my room through my wall into the whiteness that was outside.  instantly i was taken down a dark hallway, i was on my back being pulled on some type of cart.  there was something pulling me but i couldn't see what it was.  i was taken into another room and was injected with a clear liquid into my right arm that made me feel very disoriented.  the next memory i have is being levitated back through my wall and onto my bed.  i jumped up and it was 3:30 am on my clock.  i was gone for 5 hours.  everyone was asleep. no-one saw the light.  i asked my brothers and my mother and they never saw or heard anything.  i remember this so vividly.  i told everybody and the only ones who believe me were my older brother and my mother who is now deceased as she died this past may 21st 2008.  i know what i saw was real, was not under any drugs or alcohol or under sleep paralysis.  i have never seen a light so bright and that sound haunts me to this day.  i will never forget it.  i never saw what was pulling me down the hallway, just the back of whatever it was as it was a dark hallway.  i want to know what i was injected with.  i do not fear ridicule as peoples close-mindedness is their own weakness.  i am a man of logic and math.  i never layed down to go to sleep nor have i ever sleptwalked or had any delusions.  i just want to know why me!
content.summary: Being taken from my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed the glowing red balls in the northern sky (mid horizon) around 6:30 pm tonight, on jan. 1, 2009 as i was walking up the front steps to our home. the glowing brightness caught my eye. i look at the sky often and pretty much know the constellations that are normal for this time of year. this was a odd sight in a normally dark spot in the sky.  temp in the pittsburgh pa. area is in the mid 20's i believe, and except for a few scattered clouds, it���s a clear, crisp night. there were 2 of them at 1st, moving very slowly in unison, almost as if they were attached by an invisible string. they were seperated a good distance apart although i can not fairly judge that distance except to say that it was maybe the distance from the top to the bottom of the big dipper. i immediately called for my husband to come out and see and he just said "what the heck is that!" it was obvious we were seeing something very different. they were moving way too slow for a plane, made no sound and did not blink. they just looked like small red fireballs or large red colored stars. i���d guess they were about 3 times the size of the north star. (in my mind then, i wondered if it was someone flying a hot air balloon at night with a large flair of some sort!) we watched them move southward slowly in the sky for about 5-6 min. even going into the back yard to see them better. then they just disappeared. we originally thought they went behind cloud cover, but the clouds were sparse and would have emerged quickly. but they were gone in an instant. we kept looking for them and waiting for them to reappear but they didn't, so my hubby & i  went in. i went outside several more times to look again and as i was going out the door maybe 5 min. later, i saw another single one moving out of the northern sky again coming toward the area of our home. it seemed to be lower at first that the other 2. i called for the hubby again and he came out and told me to grab the binoculars since his telecsope was put away for the winter. i brought out both pair and we both looked at this "thing" but it just looked like a red fireball in the lens. it moved slowly as well and it also disappeared in the exact spot that the other 2 did. it almost looked like it fizzled out when it got to that same spot, as we were both watching it with the binoculars. we told out daughter about it and she told me to do a google search to see if anyone else saw anything or if there was something going on that would explain it. when i did the search, all i entered was "pittsburgh pa. jan. 1, 2009. red balls in sky". immediately, i got a "hit" that someone in indiana saw exactly the same thing we did, but i believe the time was a little different. reading on, i see where people all over the world saw the same thing. someone posted a short video of exactly what we saw on ufo stalker dot com but there was only one on their video. we only saw 3 of them but others have seen many more. perhaps there were more & we only caught the tail end, but we definitely saw something that was unlike anything we've ever seen before and it was nothing short of amazing. and no one will tell me it was a weather balloon either! i wonder if now i'll start making mountains out of my mashed potatoes??? lol so glad others have seen it as well.
content.summary: 3 slowly moving  bright red star-like balls.

content.detailedDescription:
new years eve 2009 appx. 12:10 am while lighting fireworks at midnight, a fireball streaked across the sky from west to east over south bozeman,mt.
it was at about 2000' agl travelling at about 300 mph. it was completely silent and travelling level just below the clouds. many people saw it, including several completely sober individuals as well as some young children. after about 30-40 seconds it disappeared into the clouds. my first thought was that it was a meteor, but it was travelling level at 2000', not decending, and much too slow to be a meteor. it was completely silent and had no flashing aircraft-type lights on it at all.
we all, including myself just watched it disappear into the clouds. i thought to myself, cool first contact!
content.summary: Silent fireball streaks across sky.

content.detailedDescription: On new years around 23:45, my girlfriend and i were outside on an open patio of an eight story building on washington ave. in downtown st. louis. we were on the south side of the building facing south, when we both noticed a formation of lights. the speed of the formation and altitude was steady and resembled what one would expect from airplanes heading toward lambert international airport. the formation was composed of points of light that looked just like stars, approximately 9 points of light with a tight cluster in the middle of this formation that appeared to be one object with five points of white lights on it in a diamond pattern. the position of the points of light did not appear to change. the formation was traveling towards the northwest. we had eyes on it for approximately two minutes and lost sight of it because of the view to the west is obstructed by the buildings design.
content.summary: Formation of approximately nine points of light, at its center five points of lights in a diamond pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched three star like objects move in a straight line, one after the other. they approached from the north shore of llandudno over the great orme and disappeared towards the west shore heading west towards ireland. they were yellow/orange/green very bright like stars but there was no sound and no trail. they were low in the sky moving at a steady pace and on a straight course.
i watched them with my 16 year old daughter for about ten minutes before they disappeared over the houses to the left of my house.
it was a very cold night (minus 3c) and very clear although there was a freezing fog. the new year fireworks had long since ended and it was eerily quiet. we went to bed after they had gone but got up ten minutes later when we heard the sound of a helicopter and planes over the great orme. we couldn't see them as they were over the horizon but assumed they had been dispatched to seek the strange objects.
content.summary: 3 star like objects moving slowly from the north shore to the west shore over the great orme.

content.detailedDescription: My friend kim and i were riving on hwy 13 out of warrensburg, mo. and about two miles out of town we both spotted a huge round object with flashig white lights following us to the right side of the vehicle. i yelled at my friend to stop the car and reluctently, she pulled over to the right side of the road. i am a proffesional photographer, so i had to see this thing and try to get a picture! when kim stopped the car. it stopped in mid air and just hovered still, there was no noise at all, it just stood still and flashed its white lights on and off about every 3 seconds. it was about 500 feet in the air and was about the size of a building. because it flashed on and off it was hard to get a clear photo of it but i did get photos of the object. kim was scared out of her mind and i was getting a little scared myself. we got in the car and pulled off down the highway, i looked behind me and saw it was still thewre standing still and flashing. while we were there we also saw another object that lookedlike a big ball of fire with a bright trail of light and it suddenly dissapeared. i will send photos after finding out how to copyright them or after you calling me.
content.summary: My friend and i were driving on hwy 13 out of warrensburg and saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
If you have tivo, you might want to re-watch the opening of todays rose bowl.

rose bowl today 01/01/2009, right as the stealth bomber was getting ready to do the fly-by, there are 2 white objects in the sky, in the upper left of the screen. 

just as the stealth flies over, one of the objects jets to the left & leaves a trail.  

i have hdtv so i can see a lot of detail. i will be watch this game like a hawk!
content.summary: Objects over rose bowl.

content.detailedDescription:
I went into the backyard to take my dog out. i was walking around near the back fence when i looked up at the sky, it was dark out so all i could see were stars. as i continued looking up, i saw what appeared to be a satelite moving to a new location, so i stood there watching. i also thought it could have been a plane i guess, but then relized it was blocking out the other, so i looked closer realizing there were three lights on the object at each corner of what seemed like a triangular shape. the object was black in colour, but that too could have been because it was night. the object was following the street called hwy 2, right behind the house, it was approximately 200' off the ground and emitting absolutely no noise whatsoever. i watched it for as long as i could, it wasn't moving fast at all, maybe 15-30mph. i noticed no windows or other lights of any kind, and the sky was completely clear that night. i know it wasn't a plane, helicopter or anything else man made. it didn't scare me, i just wish i had a video camera to have tried to capture it. i don't care if anyone believes me, i know my girlfriend didn't, but what i would like to know, is there anyway of getting radar reports of that night to verify that something indeed was there, because i know there was.
thanks paul
content.summary: At first sight i thought i saw a moving satelite, but it blocked out the other stars.

content.detailedDescription: I and my family decided to go on a trip.We went to the lake,,sisko jezero,,and then we walked to the top of a hill.Then we saw two cyclers.My father asked them to stop to make a photo of his girl friend.She was also with us.I made first one photo and then after 13 seconds i made the other photo.Exactly i didn`t see it.We didn`t hear,fell,or see anything.But when i arived at home,i was looking my photos on the computer and i saw the ufo.The place where i photographed is called ,,jelenak,, it`s on yhe mountain range bjelasica.I felt lucky to pothograph an ufo.That was my dream and it came true.After a year i photographed an other ufo,i will send the photo in the other report.
content.summary: A disc object, metal, in many colours.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:30pm on new years eve we were outside grilling, then my buddy calls my attention to the treeline to the north. many solid yellow/orange roundish lights all identical in size and brightness began slowly but steadily began appearing out of treeline in the sky . at first i thought that they were some kind of home made baloon lanterns that were caught in a light low jet stream. i began to think otherwise as i studied them further. the neighborhood was lively with people outside celebrating with fireworks and other outside activities as weather was very clear with very light clouds with nice seasonally cool temps. the stars were out and i would estimate the size of all these lights were about 3 or 4 times the size of the largerst stars out. two or three sets of lights were arranged in a triangular formation and others were strung along solo following the same course.
as i fixed my attention on them i noticed several features, 1)they were all moving the same rate of speed. 2) no blinking or twinkle or change in hue as they traversed from one end of the sky to other. 3) no sound emanating from them at all. 4)all total were 16 strung in a path about wide as my vertical hand raised arms length. 5) distance between first to last is toughest to estimate but they were at one point covering one end (obscured by treeline) to directly over us to a good portion of sky opposite end from initial direction. 6) everything about them was constant - speed, distance, course, formation, color, size, and brilliance. as they began go move furthest away, i noticed a slight changing of course or slowing down then a quick fading effect to disappearance. all 16 faded out/dissapeared at about the same point. i am still wondering how to explain to myself what these were and how large they could have been. i would estimate though minimally between the size of a large bus and a small house, maybe larger. and as for altitude i would best guess 4000-10000 ft. due to clarity of seen lights.
content.summary: Group of 16 lights strung out moving steady across sky .

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place somewhere in a area bounded by pensacola fl, gulf breeze fl, gulf shores al, fairhope al, brewton fl and milton fl.  i was a fledging naval aviator at the controls of a t34-c on a training flight with an instructor in the back seat.  incidentally, i went on to fly thousands of hours in carrier-based jets and civilian aircraft.  this was the only time in all of my flying (civilian or military) that i saw anything i considered "unidentified" and "flying."  

this event took place in daytime vfr flight conditions on top of a broken layer of clouds with excellent visibility.  the image of this event remains clear in my memory.  other specifics are a little sketchy...

we were in straight and level flight somewhere between 4,000 and 8,000 feet msl when i spotted a silver sphere ahead of us.  it appeared to be moving in the opposite direction of our flight path (if moving at all) and maintaining its altitude.  we took the object down the left side of the aircraft.  i kept sight of it until it was behind my airplane and out of sight.  our speed was probably around 200 kts.  the object if moving could not have been going too fast.  i estimate our separation at 500 feet laterally and 200 feet above vertically.  

the incident was really uneventful. i was afraid to say anything, to make any kind of issue of it as i was but a young officer and could afford little if any ridicule or extra "visibility."  i did mention the "traffic" to the instructor who acknowledged he had sight.  neither of us spoke of it again.  i think he said at the time, "i wonder what that was?"

had i been on a solo flight, i would have maneuvered the aircraft and conducted my own investigation as the object was so intriguing and unusual.  for a second, i thought maybe the object was a balloon, but we operated in well-known, well defined areas and knew of all obstacles and obstructions to flight - and it did maintain its altitude.

the incident to me was just bizarre.  it made me feel curious and interested.  

why report this now?  i have seen a tv show by or about mufon and see that i am not the only person who has seen something like an unexplained "orb."  so, hey, why not put in my two cents?  who knows, maybe it will help someone put together a bigger and more comprehensive picture of these types of sightings?
content.summary: Silver, metallic-looking, sphere, 24-48 inch diameter, smooth. (cms/sg)

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were outside on an open hillside in the east county of san diego just before midnight and were looking at the crystal clear night sky waiting for midnight.  we saw a very bright red light that appeared to be still for about 4-5 minutes and then moved very slowly from north to southwest. it appeared to stop for several more minutes and then continued curving slightly to the south, and then just disappeared. we thought that it might be a blimp with some kind of lighted advertising on it for the midnight revelers (that wasn't visible to us) but there was no sound and it appeared to be very high for that type of thing.  also, we could determine no flashing lights, which i believe is a requirement for faa aircraft.  just after it vanished in the clear night, we saw an commercial airplane in a regular flight plan that was crossing into approximately the same area of the sky where the light was last seen before it disappeared.
content.summary: Very bright red lights in clear night sky, moving slowly from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going for my photo assignment during the new year eve, heading  towards a resort hotel to cover the fireworks display. i position myself at a tungku beach facing the hotel from far so that i can frame the fireworks and the hotel all in one frame. when i was there and the fireworks started i started firing shots with my camera using a cable release connected to my canon eos 5d digital camera + canon 70-200mm f2.8 is (l) lens and a manfrotto tripod stand. the firework started exactly 12.00am (+0800gmt) at the empire hotel and country club. the fireworks lasted for about 20-30 minutes. without checking my lcd screen on my camera as most of the shots were burst frames, i left the area. when i was processing the raw images (not jpeg files) captured from the camera i realise there was one shot which had something appearing on the left side of the screen so i zoomed in to see what it was. i was shocked! in the image, the object seemed to be hovering above the water and it looks as if it's not too far away from us. strangely...The object wasn't being seen with my naked eye when i was there. thousands of people gathered around the same area to view the fireworks. if i were to see it with my eyes, probably the others would have saw it too however it wasn't visible as it was quite dark from our view. or maybe... our eye were drawn towards where the fireworks were so i didn't notice it as it seems like the object positioned itself at a darker area (can be seen in the photo). 

* i have attached the jpeg and the raw version of the file for your investigation. please credit my name if you were going to use it for any purpose.

* all original data are embedded in the exif of the images. feel free to check it. the time stamp in the exif is not right, kindly ignore that as the camera time wasn't set properly.
content.summary: A stange object appeared in the night sky during a firework photo assignment on new near eve covering for the newspaper (borneo bulletin).

content.detailedDescription:
While coming home on the 8 east freeway, i noticed a strange red light hovering above the city of el cajon. after a minute or two, the red light seemed to move at a very slow pace toward the southwest. it did not have any blinking lights like an aircraft. its movement was far too slow to be an airplane and it didn���t move in the same fashion as a helicopter.

we got off the freeway on the johnson exit, thought about going home, but decided to get a better look at the light instead. so we turned around and started traveling down johnson. we saw a mother and two children standing on the sidewalk pointing at the light. we had the windows rolled down and were going slow enough to hear them asking each other what the light could be.

about a block later, we pulled over and began filming the light. the light which had been moving southwest, stopped. a few moments later, the light began traveling in the opposite direction at a slightly faster rate of speed. because it was moving in the direction of our house, we thought we could get home so we could film it with a better quality video camera (the only thing we had with us was a sony cybershot).

by the time we turned the car around and started toward home, the light had vanished. we only took our eyes off the thing for a minute or two, and then it was gone. if it continued moving at the same slow rate of speed it had been, it should still have been in the sky.
we're unsure of what the thing was. in all, the sighting lasted about ten minutes or so. i'm sure many others must have seen this light.

you can see the light in the clip, as well as a nearby star. because of the low quality of the video though, it is impossible to tell what it is.
content.summary: Bright red light over el cajon

content.detailedDescription: Walkin back from shops in cookham looked up and saw a big orange glow in sky throught it was a plane as im on fly path but no lights on just a big orange slow comin cross the sky wacthed it for bout 1min or 2 keeped moving so i could watch it time was bout 18 20 or 25 just didnt look like plane  please got back 2 me if anyone easy has seen this thank you
content.summary: A orange glow in sky just moving cross sky moving up slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife &i sitting inside watching tv,i saw blue flash outside.See looked up and pointed out bright star.I got jvc camrecorder i recorded for about an hour trying to keep object in the center of camera,also trying different magnifications.

i was just trying to figure out what it was.It went away in about an hour.

i have it still on the recorder.
content.summary: Star shape to the naked eye, saw star go into star, on camrecorder, object changed 4 different colors, moved in & out changing cycles.
